T02TD1678E:276a-1: sam siddhi mah'a shr'i he ru ka no pi ka n'a ma /
T02TD1678E:276a-3: dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag par grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1678E:276a-4: bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1678E:276a-5: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid //
T02TD1678E:276a-6: sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa //
T02TD1678E:276a-7: rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs //
T02TD1678E:276a-8: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog de'i //
T02TD1678E:276a-9: shes rab kyi ni blo phye nas //
T02TD1678E:276a-10: nges par rtogs pa'i sa gzhi las //
T02TD1678E:276a-11: bla mas nges pa'i lung 'di bstan //
T02TD1678E:276a-12: snum pa yi ni dam tshig dang //
T02TD1678E:276a-13: gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1678E:276a-14: de dag goms nas nyams su blang //
T02TD1678E:276a-15: blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni //
T02TD1678E:276a-17: phung byed gnyis ka bsregs pas na //
T02TD1678E:276b-0: de bas gzhan du @276b bstan pa min //
T02TD1678E:276b-1: phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas //
T02TD1678E:276b-2: rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag pa ni /
T02TD1678E:276b-5: ma lus khyab pas mnyes byas te //
T02TD1678E:276b-6: re dang dam pa'i tshul zhes dgongs //
T02TD1678E:276b-7: 'od zer de dag bsdus nas kyang ;
T02TD1678E:276b-8: / dur khrod sa ru brtag par bya //
T02TD1678E:276b-9: 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang //
T02TD1678E:276b-10: gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams bya //
T02TD1678E:276b-11: dkyil 'khor nub phyogs de bzhin gzhi //
T02TD1678E:276b-12: kham phor ri mo bris pa dgu //
T02TD1678E:276b-13: snang ba'i 'od dang bcas par dgram //
T02TD1678E:276b-14: rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag / mig gi rten yang mngon par bya //
T02TD1678E:276b-15: de nas dur khrod bdag po dag / phyag rgya che dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1678E:276b-16: ci rigs su ni las rnams bya //
T02TD1678E:276b-17: mi dmigs chos la blo brtags shing //
T02TD1678E:276b-18: ye shes can gyi byin stobs kyis //
T02TD1678E:276b-19: thams cad tshul bzhin byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1678E:276b-20: rtogs pa'i blo can de dag gis //
T02TD1678E:276b-21: srog lus man chad rdzas kyi rnams //
T02TD1678E:276b-22: bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul //
T02TD1678E:276b-23: dngos grub 'dod pas gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1678E:276b-24: slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas //
T02TD1678E:276b-25: rdo rje'i tshul du dbang can sbyin //
T02TD1678E:276b-26: g-yog phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du //
T02TD1678E:276b-27: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
T02TD1678E:276b-28: gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02TD1678E:276b-29: de la 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal //
T02TD1678E:276b-30: 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD1678E:276b-32: thim pas rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1678E:276b-33: ye shes dam tshig chen po yis //
T02TD1678E:276b-34: bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te //
T02TD1678E:276b-35: padmo rin chen ldan byas nas /
T02TD1678E:276b-36: dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung bya ste //
T02TD1678E:276b-37: rang rig ye shes de la 'od //
T02TD1678E:276b-38: ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag / dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher //
T02TD1678E:276b-39: byang chub sems de kun du dag / khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang //
T02TD1678E:276b-40: ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te //
T02TD1678E:276b-41: 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes //
T02TD1678E:276b-43: de dag dngos grub chen po bas //
T02TD1678E:276b-44: ji ltar 'dod par nan tan bya //
T02TD1678E:276b-45: dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gis //
T02TD1678E:277a-2: dam tshig chen pos bde bar gnas //
T02TD1678E:277a-3: bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang thob nas //
T02TD1678E:277a-4: sgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan //
T02TD1678E:277a-5: ston pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du //
T02TD1678E:277a-6: sgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya //
T02TD1678E:277a-7: lhag pa'i rtag skyis kun mtshon nas ;
T02TD1678E:277a-8: / grub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1678E:277a-9: dmigs med rtogs pa'i gdeng can gyis //
T02TD1678E:277a-10: sku mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam //
T02TD1678E:277a-11: khams gsum khrag tu dmigs nas ni //
T02TD1678E:277a-12: dur khrod kun du khyab par bsam //
T02TD1678E:277a-13: dngos ni aa ru byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1678E:277a-14: rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-15: byang chub sems ni 'od zer spro //
T02TD1678E:277a-16: mos pa'i thugs la mnyes bsams nas //
T02TD1678E:277a-18: phyag mtshan snying po pho mo dag / bstan par red nas mkha' la gzhag / bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas //
T02TD1678E:277a-19: des kyang spro ba'i las rnams byed //
T02TD1678E:277a-20: dngos kyang mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo //
T02TD1678E:277a-21: sangs rgyas tshe 'dis bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1678E:277a-22: sku gsum sa la goms par bya //
T02TD1678E:277a-23: dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la //
T02TD1678E:277a-24: dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom //
T02TD1678E:277a-25: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis //
T02TD1678E:277a-26: thams cad du yang khyab par bya //
T02TD1678E:277a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa //
T02TD1678E:277a-29: zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag / bsnyen pa'i don du de dag byung //
T02TD1678E:277a-30: sgrub pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du //
T02TD1678E:277a-31: sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-32: rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-33: bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom //
T02TD1678E:277a-34: dngos grub dam pa blang ba'i phyir //
T02TD1678E:277a-35: snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te //
T02TD1678E:277a-36: bskal ba'i med dpung 'khrig pa bzhin //
T02TD1678E:277a-37: 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD1678E:277a-38: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te //
T02TD1678E:277a-39: bzhugs dang rten dang mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1678E:277a-40: dam tshig zil gnon phyag byed dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-41: mchod dang bstod dang bz'a ba dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-42: tshul rigs goms pa'i blo dag gis //
T02TD1678E:277a-43: ci rigs su ni brtan par bya //
T02TD1678E:277a-44: dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang //
T02TD1678E:277a-45: bskul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes //
T02TD1678E:277b-0: 'khor bcas mchod @277b pa rdzogs nas ni //
T02TD1678E:277b-1: bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad //
T02TD1678E:277b-2: zhag grangs dus ni brtags pa'o //
T02TD1678E:277b-3: mtshan ma brtan po byung ba na //
T02TD1678E:277b-4: sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya //
T02TD1678E:277b-5: bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang //
T02TD1678E:277b-6: 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog / dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs can yang //
T02TD1678E:277b-7: re dang dogs pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1678E:277b-8: ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi 'byung //
T02TD1678E:277b-9: phan gnod byed pa rnam gnyis po //
T02TD1678E:277b-10: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag ni /
T02TD1678E:277b-11: rnam pa gsum po byung ba ni /
T02TD1678E:277b-12: dogs dang chags pa'i sems spangs te //
T02TD1678E:277b-13: bye brag tu ni shes par bya //
T02TD1678E:277b-14: nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don spyad //
T02TD1678E:277b-15: gal te 'byung po mnan par bya //
T02TD1678E:277b-16: kun kyang sems can don du bsngo //
T02TD1678E:277b-17: sgrub pa chen po yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1678E:277b-18: grub pa'i slob dpon chen po badzra h'um ka ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1678E:277b-21: // / bod kyi lha btsan po khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' lung gis dpal na lendra'i gtsug lag kyang du /
T02TD1678E:277b-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po h'um ka ra de nyid dang /
T02TD1678E:277b-23: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe gnubs nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pa'o//
